replies.msg:
Every morning,Mr Wong has a probability of 0.3 to go to work by taxi. In a week of 6 working days,

a.find the probability that Mr wong goes to work by taxi in at least 3days,given that
(i) he goes to work by taxi for at most 4 days,
(ii) he goes to work by taxi for more than 1 day.

b.find the probability that mr wong goes to work by taxi in exactly 2 consecutive mornings
唔該

Every morning,Mr Wong has a probability of 0.3 to go to work by taxi. In a week of 6 working days,

a.find the probability that Mr wong goes to work by taxi in at least 3days,given that
(i) he goes to work by taxi for at most 4 days,
(ii) he goes to work by taxi for more than 1 day.

b.find the probability that mr wong goes to work by taxi in exactly 2 consecutive mornings
唔該


a i
(0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2)/(0.7^6+0.3*0.7^5+0.3^2*0.7^4+0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2)

a ii
(0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2 + 0.3^5*0.7+0.3^6)/(0.3^2*0.7^4+0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2 + 0.3^5*0.7+0.3^6)

b
0.3^2*0.7^4*5

Every morning,Mr Wong has a probability of 0.3 to go to work by taxi. In a week of 6 working days,

a.find the probability that Mr wong goes to work by taxi in at least 3days,given that
(i) he goes to work by taxi for at most 4 days,
(ii) he goes to work by taxi for more than 1 day.

b.find the probability that mr wong goes to work by taxi in exactly 2 consecutive mornings
唔該


a i
(0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2)/(0.7^6+0.3*0.7^5+0.3^2*0.7^4+0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2)

a ii

b
0.3^2*0.7^4*5

漏左combination

a i
(0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2)/(0.7^6+0.3*0.7^5+0.3^2*0.7^4+0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2)

我計到了加左combination 後
唔該兩位巴打

Every morning,Mr Wong has a probability of 0.3 to go to work by taxi. In a week of 6 working days,

a.find the probability that Mr wong goes to work by taxi in at least 3days,given that
(i) he goes to work by taxi for at most 4 days,
(ii) he goes to work by taxi for more than 1 day.

b.find the probability that mr wong goes to work by taxi in exactly 2 consecutive mornings
唔該


a i
(0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2)/(0.7^6+0.3*0.7^5+0.3^2*0.7^4+0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2)

a ii
(0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2 + 0.3^5*0.7+0.3^6)/(0.3^2*0.7^4+0.3^3*0.7^3 + 0.3^4*0.7^2 + 0.3^5*0.7+0.3^6)

b
0.3^2*0.7^4*5

漏左combination
